project.name: VibeBeat — Hackathon Board
project.description: Lightweight Kanban for the vibebeat.io hackathon. Columns: Backlog, In Progress, Review, Done. Custom fields: Priority, Area, Phase.

steps: Create an empty GitHub Project (Projects ‘beta’/v2) in your org or user.
Use a small script with GitHub CLI to add columns and custom fields based on this JSON.
Then bulk add issues from github_issues_vibebeat.csv; set Status/Fields via the project UI or a follow-up script.
how_to_apply_with_gh_cli.script_hint: Use `gh project field-create` and `gh project column-create` iterating over this JSON. Example script intentionally omitted to keep this file importable anywhere.
